What does the disk that fell on the ground contain? I’ve watched Chobits years ago and was curious.
The first episode/chapter tells us about how Hideki found Chii in the dumpster.
According to the plot description in the Wikipedia article Chobits (bold emphasis mine):
What does the disk contain?

Why didn't the writer reveal the contents of the disk that fell on the ground? As mentioned in this question, I am wondering why the writer or the creator of the anime Chobits didn't reveal a crucial thing such as the contents of the disk in question.
According to this answer, the manga revealed the contents of the disk in the late chapters. Why did they not do so in the anime?
As I am not very familiar with finding writer's or creator's comments on their works, I am having a hard time understanding this.
Any reference linked to the subject matter or facts referring to the creation of this anime is very much appreciated.
